text:
Congratulations @karinagould.
Please use this position to reconcile a) supporting the #COVAX #surplus donation mechanism & b) simultaneously saying Canada, w/ most #COVID19 #vaccine doses secured per person (10+) in the world, can't make donation plans b/c surplus "hypothetical". https://t.co/Djmwab2GVF https://t.co/XUUD9t8KBL
